keeper59.title: keeper59.desc
Moleman: Digs tunnels in preparation for his vengeance

keeper59.title: upgrades.keeper59.desc
Moleman: A strange creature that balances throughput and speed.

keeper59.title: upgrades.keeper59movespeed1.desc
Moleman: Increases your speed when moving outside of tunnels.

keeper59.title: upgrades.keeper59tunnellength1.desc
Moleman:
Increases the max length of your tunnels.

Hold the dig button to increase tunnel length before releasing the tunneler.

keeper59.title: upgrades.keeper59tunnellength2.desc
Moleman: Increases the max length of your tunnels.

keeper59.title: upgrades.keeper59tunnellength3.desc
Moleman: Increases the max length of your tunnels.

keeper59.title: upgrades.keeper59tunnellength4.desc
Moleman:
Increases the max length of your tunnels.

(this is maybe overpowered)

keeper59.title: upgrades.keeper59tunnelerstrength1.desc
Moleman: Makes the tunneler dig faster and increases damage caused by you when travelling in tunnels.

keeper59.title: upgrades.keeper59tunnelerstrength2.desc
Moleman: Makes the tunneler dig faster and increases damage caused by you when travelling in tunnels.

keeper59.title: upgrades.keeper59tunnelerstrength3.desc
Moleman: Makes the tunneler dig faster and increases damage caused by you when travelling in tunnels.

keeper59.title: upgrades.keeper59queuedtunnelers.desc
Moleman: While a tunneler is digging, you can fire another tunneler to continue from where it finishes.

keeper59.title: upgrades.keeper59queuedsplittunnelers.desc
Moleman: The queued tunnelers will split and shoot off to the sides of the first tunnel.

keeper59.title: upgrades.keeper59queuedsplittunnelerssquared.desc
Moleman:
Queue even more tunnelers after the initial split.

They will be half the length of the first split.

keeper59.title: upgrades.keeper59mineralextraction.desc
Moleman: While digging a tunnel through resources, they are spit out of the tunnel.

keeper59.title: upgrades.keeper59tunnelvacuum.desc
Moleman:
Tunnels will hoover up resources close to them.

Press the dig button to reverse direction when inside a tunnel.

keeper59.title: upgrades.keeper59tunnelreducedfriction.desc
Moleman:
Tunnels receive normal damage when you quickly travel back and forth through them.

Otherwise, tunnels will last longer if seldomly used.

keeper59.title: upgrades.keeper59tunnelspeed1.desc
Moleman: You move even faster when travelling in tunnels.

keeper59.title: upgrades.keeper59tunnelspeed2.desc
Moleman: You move much faster when travelling in tunnels.

keeper59.title: upgrades.keeper59tunneldetonation.desc
Moleman:
Detonate finished tunnels using the same button you drop resources with.

Will probably be removed since it's super OP...
